OOC: I had hoped someone else would have replied, but oh, well...

BIC: Blackfang backed away a bit, leaving his knife in the wound. It 
wasn't very far though, and a lot too near Perceptor. As a result, he 
got hit so by almost all of the shots. That was not going to stop him 
right now.

Blackfang: I hope you know you have a chance to back off from this 
fight, or else, it will be a fight to the death.

He takes his pulse laser and fires a volley of small energy darts at 
his enemy.
